symptom_description: House Blend roast color lighter than expected, Riverside Café reports inconsistency
root_cause: Roast temperature 8°F above profile — thermocouple calibration drift
corrective_action: Recalibrated thermocouple. Pulled remaining Batch B-2025-0115 inventory. Added thermocouple check to weekly PM.

symptom_description: Woodlands Hotel reports 'burnt taste' in House Blend — may be same batch as QI-2025-008
